title: The American Journal of Police Science

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

see-also.note: Journal of Criminal Law and Criminology

additional-note: This publication was absorbed by the Journal of Criminal Law and Criminology in 1932.  For some time after, that publication included a section with this title, and included 'Police Science' in its title or subtitle.  As noted in that journal's copyright information record, some of those issues have copyright renewals.
